Wiretap Table 7—Authorized Intercepts Granted Pursuant to 18  § U.S.C. 2519 as Reported in Wiretap Reports
For Calendar Years 2008 - 2018
Avg. number of persons intercepted ²
Average number of intercepted communications ²
Average number of incriminating intercepted communications ²
Average cost of intercepts for which costs reported
Intercept applications authorized but reported after publication³
Total authorized by year (reported through March 2019)

NOTE: Offense groupings were altered in 2017 to be consistent with Published Table 3 numbers but did not change the Totals.
¹ Installed intercepts include only those intercepts for which reports were received from prosecuting officials.
² The average excludes those reports in which the number of persons intercepted, the number of intercepts, or the number of incriminating intercepts was not reported or could not be determined.
³ Some wiretaps terminated in a given year are not reported until a subsequent year because they are part of ongoing investigations.
